response.original_title: How I Met My Girlfriend: Elsa Jean
response.overview: Do you remember your day spent with super sweet Elsa Jean? How could you forget... having her as a girlfriend is a dream come true. Elsa is cute, adorable, and incredibly sexy. Now is your chance to claim the missing part of the story. Experience what you could never before and get drowned in the fantasy of taking her out for a date and making her yours. It is up to you what path you choose to take her in your bed and make her fall in love with you. Lust, enjoyment, excitement, and passion are ahead of you. You do not want to miss the adventure! Elsa awaits, don't let her down! She is the embodiment of your every desire, be the man you always wanted to be.
response.title: How I Met My Girlfriend: Elsa Jean
